item.title: My Heart as a Hallway ~or~ The Mountain, the Sea, and Me
item.description: I've recently begun to think of my heart as a hallway -as if every moment of this life is a gift to be received, loved, and let go. Ideally, I welcome each experience to enter, pass through and exit with kindness and free of judgment. Gratitude, Grace and Generosity brace the structure and hold this passage open. My existence takes on a mythical Flow.

item.title: Through many younger years, I slow-cooked...
item.description:
Through many younger years, I slow-cooked...

...over the concern that enduring tribulation might somehow burn away the best parts of me â€“that by suffering a difficult job or committing to a real relationship whatever soul I had might just wither away.
